markdown:
**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 91 1.1 **Trigger** An enemy in your champion’s aura damages you --- Your self-interest keeps you safe. You gain resistance against the triggering damage equal to 2 + half your level, regardless of damage type.
In addition, your Strikes against the triggering creature deal 1 extra spirit damage until the end of your next turn. This extra damage increases to 2 at 9th level and 3 at 16th level.
name: Selfish Shield
